snippet: The state attorney general issued a scathing critique of the Albuquerque Police Department on Friday over its finding that a high-profile civil rights lawyer committed suicide.
abstract: New Mexico Atty Gen Gary King issues scathing critique of Albuquerque Police Department over its finding that Mary Han, high-profile civil rights lawyer, committed suicide, saying that evidence in her 2010 death fails to definitively indicate suicide.
lead_paragraph: The state attorney general issued a scathing critique of the Albuquerque Police Department on Friday over its finding that a high-profile civil rights lawyer committed suicide.

headline.main: New Mexico: Albuquerque Police Are Criticized in Lawyer’s Death
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Albuquerque Police Are Criticized In Lawyer’s Death
